instance_template: loc("A";"B";"C";"D";"E"). deliver_to("C";"E"). edge("A","B"). edge("A","D"). edge("B","C"). edge("D","E"). time(0..6).

hard_constraints.description: Every journey must start from the beginning; therefore, we require the bot to be at station A at the initial time step 0.
To ensure valid movement, the robot is only allowed to transition between two stations if they are connected by a marked path. We forbid any move between non-adjacent stations.
hard_constraints.asp_rule: :- at(L1, T), at(L2, T+1), not edge(L1, L2), not edge(L2, L1), time(T), time(T+1).

hard_constraints.description: The mission objectives are specific: the robot must visit each of the delivery stations, such as C and E, exactly one time during its entire operation.
hard_constraints.asp_rule: :- deliver_to(L), N = #count { T : at(L, T) }, N != 1.
